ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: RVFV Clone 13 was kindly provided by Dr. Michèle Bouloy (Institut Pasteur, France). Marga van Setten is acknowledged for production of the VHHs in yeast, Amy Clarijs for her assistance with the SBV VHH pannings and Mirriam Tacken, Sophie van Oort and Yanyin Lin for the baculo virus expressions. Members of Early Expression and Supply, Purification Process Sciences and Analytical Sciences teams in AstraZeneca are acknowledged for generation of the bispecific human-llama chimeric antibodies. This study was performed as part of the Zoonotic Anticipation and Preparedness Initiative (ZAPI project; IMI Grant Agreement no. 115760), with the assistance and financial support of the Innovative Medicines Initiative (IMI) and the European Commission, and in-kind contributions from EFPIA partners.
